idea-plugin.name: File & Directory Nesting
idea-plugin.description:
Nest directories under files with matching names in the project tree view.

Organizes your codebase with Rails/Laravel-style concern patterns:

  • User.rb + User/ directory → directory nests under file
  • User.php + User/ directory → directory nests under file
  • Makes concern directories collapsible under their parent files
  • Cleaner project tree for domain-driven design patterns

Works across all JetBrains IDEs:

  • RubyMine (Rails concerns)
  • PhpStorm (Laravel traits)
  • WebStorm (React/Vue component folders)
  • IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, GoLand, and more

Features:

  • Configurable file extensions (Settings → Editor → General → Advanced Nesting)
  • Case-insensitive matching
  • Lightweight and performant
  • No code changes required
